Trade/Device Name(s): Hevylite Human IgM Kappa Kit for use on SPAPLUS
Hevylite Human IgM Lambda Kit for use on SPAPLUS
Regulation Name(s): Immunoglobulins A, G, M, D, and E immunological test system
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Hevylite Human IgM Kappa and Lambda turbidimetric quantification kits for use on SPAPLUS platform
Indications for Use Summary: In vitro quantification of IgM kappa and IgM lambda in human serum for patients with previously diagnosed Waldenström’s macroglobulinaemia, to be used in conjunction with other clinical and laboratory findings; not established for diagnosis, monitoring, or prognosis of Waldenström’s macroglobulinaemia
